name: Spelling Quest
description:
You are a wizard's apprentice trying to pass your wizard test!

You haven't been the most studious sorcerer, but you have a trick up your sleeve.

You know how to brew a GOOD AT SPELLS potion. The only issue is... the ingredients for the potion lie in the dungeons below.

Venture into the dungeons and defeat enemies to find ingredients and pass your wizard test!
